title: Odessa, OR
description: Erin Hill lives a comfortable life with her loving partner and their child, Julian, in the town of Odessa, Oregon. But on a winter night, a malevolent presence begins possessing Julian. Erin is haunted too, by dreams that take her to a terrifying alternate world. As their house and their lives are ravaged, Erin searches for answers, but neither her partner Adrian or detective Nathaniel Simmons will accept the impossible truth. There is one who can help. An archaeologist named Annabel Moore, who discovered the dark secret years ago. But is it too late? Odessa, Or is an epic and terrifying journey into the shadows lurking behind the everyday, in the places we don't want to go and the truths we don't want to see. Mark Swanson's debut novel blends horror, magical realism, dystopic science-fiction and biting social commentary into a frightening tale of domination and resistance.
author: Mark  Swanson
